Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE FUNCTION [Roundtomidnight](@DATE DATETIME, @TZ_NAME NVARCHAR(50) = NULL) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN SELECT VALUE = CASE WHEN @DATE IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (SELECT value FROM [innovator].[ConvertFromLocal_Table](Dateadd(D, 0, Datediff(D, 0, (SELECT value FROM [innovator].[ConvertToLocal_Table](@DATE, @TZ_NAME)))), @TZ_NAME)) END
Item.name: RoundToMidnight
